About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: Passionate about technological innovation and automation...
About.paragraph2: My journey in development began during my experience at Ingedata...
About.paragraph3: Subsequently, I designed a task tracking application...
About.paragraph4: To enhance my skills, I took a training course...
About.paragraph5: Following this training, I worked on a payroll management project...
About.paragraph6: In parallel, I am pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science at the National Center for Distance Education...

Introduction.title: Mampionona - Full Stack Web Developer
Introduction.description: Specializing in the creation of complex applications such as ERPs and HR systems, I use technologies like React, Node.js, and Laravel to design high-performance and innovative solutions. Explore my projects in this portfolio.

items.name: Productivity Tracking Application
items.description: This application helps users track their productivity and manage their tasks efficiently.

items.name: Building Energy Management
items.description: This system allows for optimized energy management in buildings.

items.name: Payroll Management
items.description: This project simplifies the management of salaries and payments in companies.

items.name: Room Booking Management
items.description: This project facilitates the management of bookings and the use of rooms.
